flawed_nl_solution:
Each pan costs $10 to make so for 20 pans, it will cost 10*20 = $<<10*20=200>>200
She sells each of the 20 pans for $25 each so she will make 20*25 = $<<20*25=500>>500
She makes $500 and spent $200 on ingredients so she makes 500-200 = $<<500-200=299>>299
#### 299

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 299. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
